import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import sampleIcon from '../../assets/images/default.png' import { fetchApiData, storeApiData } from "../../api/api"; const toggleDropdown = (dropdownState, index) => { let dropdown = document.getElementsByClassName('company_applier__wrapper__card--center__dropdown')[index]; if (dropdownState) { dropdown.style.display = 'none'; }else { dropdown.style.display = 'block'; } } const CompanyApplierItem = ({index, id, title, description, document, status, applicationDate, profile, company, job}) => { const [dropdownState, setDropdownState] = useState(false) const [doRefresh, setDoRefresh] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { toggleDropdown(dropdownState, index) setDropdownState(!dropdownState); } const showDetail = () => { console.log('a') } return ( <>
    • setJobTitle(e.target.value)}/>
    setJobTag(e.target.value)}/>
    setJobCount(e.target.value)}/>
    setJobSalary(e.target.value)}/>
    setJobCloseDate(e.target.value)}/>

    ) } export default CompanyApplierItem
